Binary: lirc, lirc-doc, liblirc0t64, liblirc-dev, liblirc-client0t64, lirc-x
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-exec, dh-python, doxygen, expect [!hurd-any], kmod [linux-any], libasound2-dev [linux-any kfreebsd-any], libftdi1-dev, libpython3-dev (>= 3.5), systemd-dev [linux-any], libsystemd-dev [linux-any], libudev-dev [linux-any], libusb-dev, libusb-1.0-0-dev, libx11-dev, man2html-base, pkgconf, portaudio19-dev, python3-dev:any (>= 3.5), python3-setuptools, python3-yaml:native, socat [!hurd-any], systemd [linux-any], xsltproc, dpkg-dev (>= 1.22.5)
Package-List: liblirc-client0t64 deb libs optional arch=any liblirc-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any liblirc0t64 deb libs optional arch=any lirc deb utils optional arch=any lirc-doc deb doc optional arch=all lirc-x deb utils optional arch=any
